item.title: I'm happy to be Co-Chair of RECITAL 2020 !
item.description: I’m happy to be part of the organizing comitee of RECITAL, co-located (virtually) with JEP and TALN 2020. The conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2020 will be held online from 8 to 19 June. https://jep-taln2020.loria.fr/
